name: 陳昶瑞
objective: 待修正；本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
schedule:
Week 01: Course Introduction
Week 02: Construction Site Erosion and Sediment Control
Week 03: Control of Construction Site Runoff
Week 04: Planning Steps and Components for Construction Site Control
Week 05: Construction Activity Subject to Erosion and Sediment Control
Week 06: Local Rainfall Conditions and Methods of Determining Runoff
Week 07: Watershed Delineation
Week 08: Erosion Mechanisms and Rain Energy
Week 09: Midterm Exam
Week 10: The Revised Universal Soil Loss Equation
Week 11: Relating Rain Energy to Erosion Yield
Week 12: Predicitions of Soil Losses from a Construction Site
Week 13: Establishing Vegetation
Week 14: General Channel Stability and Drainage Design
Week 15: Slope Stability Applied to Construction Site Erosion Control Design
Week 16: Sediment Pond Design Fundamentals
Week 17: Filter Fences for Construction Site Sediment Control
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
50% - Assigned Readings/Assignments
30% - Midterm and Final Exams
20% - Semester Project
materials: Pitt, R., Lake, D., and Clark, S. (2006). Construction Site Erosion and Sediment Controls: Planning, Design, and Performance, DEStech Publications, Inc.
